item.title: If SHA256 produces an alphanumeric hash, how can a hash be "less than a certain value"?
item.description:
If SHA256 produces an alphanumeric hash, how can a hash be "less than a certain value"?

You treat the hash as a base 16 number, and compare it like you would an integer. So, for example, with normal numbers, to determine that 926 is less than 941, you basically follow this reasoning: The numbers have the same number of digits, so nothing can be determined yet.

item.title: Narco trade via Darknet, Bitcoin reported in India for first time
item.description:
Narco trade via Darknet, Bitcoin reported in India for first time

Drug trafficking in India is on a new 'high' with anti-narcotics agencies having detected the crime being perpetrated through the cryptic 'darknet' and the clandestine and unregulated currency Bitcoin. The Narcotics Control Bureau (NCB), chief law enforcement and intelligence agency responsible for fighting drug trafficking and abuse of illegal substances, has interdicted two such syndicates operating in the country.

item.title: Narco trade via Darknet, Bitcoin reported in India - Times of India
item.description:
Narco trade via Darknet, Bitcoin reported in India - Times of India

NEW DELHI: Drug trafficking in India is on a new 'high' with anti-narcotics agencies having detected the crime being perpetrated through the cryptic 'darknet' and the clandestine and unregulated currency Bitcoin. The narcotics Control Bureau (NCB), chief law enforcement and intelligence agency responsible for fighting drug trafficking and abuse of illegal substances, has interdicted two such syndicates operating in the country.

item.title: Coinbase is silently tracking how you spend you coins * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Coinbase is silently tracking how you spend you coins * /r/Bitcoin

Bitcoin is the currency of the Internet: a distributed, worldwide, decentralized digital money. Unlike traditional currencies such as dollars, bitcoins are issued and managed without any central authority whatsoever: there is no government, company, or bank in charge of Bitcoin. As such, it is more resistant to wild inflation and corrupt banks.

item.title: The Ethereum Geth Client 1.4.10 Available Now With Hard Fork Support
item.description:
The Ethereum Geth Client 1.4.10 Available Now With Hard Fork Support

The latest Ethereum Go client Geth version 1.4.10 named "Return of the ETH" has been just made available for download as the go-ethereum team's DAO hard-fork implementation. It enables anyone to choose whether they would like to support the DAO hard-fork or oppose it, and take them to their blockchain of choice.
